amendment.description: To require the use of Environmental Protection Agency funds to implement recommendations relating to clean and safe water compliance.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3607 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3607 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Stabenow to Amendment SA 3399. (consideration: CR S5499-5503; text: CR S5501) To require the use of Environmental Protection Agency funds to implement recommendations relating to clean and safe water compliance.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3607 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Stabenow to Amendment SA 3399.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3607 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
